La référence suivante est une liste complète des erreurs que vous pouvez rencontrer lors de l'utilisation d'Astro. Pour une assistance supplémentaire, y compris les pièges courants, veuillez également consulter notre [Guide de dépannage](/fr/guides/troubleshooting/).

## Erreurs d'Astro

- [**UnknownCompilerError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-compiler-error/) (E01000)<br/>Unknown compiler error.
- [**StaticRedirectNotAvailable**](/fr/reference/errors/static-redirect-not-available/) (E03001)<br/>`Astro.redirect` is not available in static mode.
- [**ClientAddressNotAvailable**](/fr/reference/errors/client-address-not-available/) (E03002)<br/>`Astro.clientAddress` is not available in current adapter.
- [**StaticClientAddressNotAvailable**](/fr/reference/errors/static-client-address-not-available/) (E03003)<br/>`Astro.clientAddress` is not available in static mode.
- [**NoMatchingStaticPathFound**](/fr/reference/errors/no-matching-static-path-found/) (E03004)<br/>No static path found for requested path.
- [**OnlyResponseCanBeReturned**](/fr/reference/errors/only-response-can-be-returned/) (E03005)<br/>Invalid type returned by Astro page.
- [**MissingMediaQueryDirective**](/fr/reference/errors/missing-media-query-directive/) (E03006)<br/>Missing value for `client:media` directive.
- [**NoMatchingRenderer**](/fr/reference/errors/no-matching-renderer/) (E03007)<br/>No matching renderer found.
- [**NoClientEntrypoint**](/fr/reference/errors/no-client-entrypoint/) (E03008)<br/>No client entrypoint specified in renderer.
- [**NoClientOnlyHint**](/fr/reference/errors/no-client-only-hint/) (E03009)<br/>Missing hint on `client:only` directive.
- [**InvalidGetStaticPathParam**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-get-static-path-param/) (E03010)<br/>Invalid value returned by a `getStaticPaths` path.
- [**InvalidGetStaticPathsReturn**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-get-static-paths-return/) (E03011)<br/>Invalid value returned by getStaticPaths.
- [**GetStaticPathsRemovedRSSHelper**](/fr/reference/errors/get-static-paths-removed-rsshelper/) (E03012)<br/>getStaticPaths RSS helper is not available anymore.
- [**GetStaticPathsExpectedParams**](/fr/reference/errors/get-static-paths-expected-params/) (E03013)<br/>Missing params property on `getStaticPaths` route.
- [**GetStaticPathsInvalidRouteParam**](/fr/reference/errors/get-static-paths-invalid-route-param/) (E03014)<br/>Invalid value for `getStaticPaths` route parameter.
- [**GetStaticPathsRequired**](/fr/reference/errors/get-static-paths-required/) (E03015)<br/>`getStaticPaths()` function required for dynamic routes.
- [**ReservedSlotName**](/fr/reference/errors/reserved-slot-name/) (E03016)<br/>Invalid slot name.
- [**NoAdapterInstalled**](/fr/reference/errors/no-adapter-installed/) (E03017)<br/>Cannot use Server-side Rendering without an adapter.
- [**NoMatchingImport**](/fr/reference/errors/no-matching-import/) (E03018)<br/>No import found for component.
- [**InvalidPrerenderExport**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-prerender-export/) (E03019)<br/>Invalid prerender export.
- [**InvalidComponentArgs**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-component-args/) (E03020)<br/>Invalid component arguments.
- [**PageNumberParamNotFound**](/fr/reference/errors/page-number-param-not-found/) (E03021)<br/>Page number param not found.
- [**UnknownViteError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-vite-error/) (E04000)<br/>Unknown Vite Error.
- [**FailedToLoadModuleSSR**](/fr/reference/errors/failed-to-load-module-ssr/) (E04001)<br/>Could not import file.
- [**InvalidGlob**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-glob/) (E04002)<br/>Invalid glob pattern.
## Erreurs de CSS 

- [**UnknownCSSError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-csserror/) (E05000)<br/>Unknown CSS Error.
- [**CSSSyntaxError**](/fr/reference/errors/csssyntax-error/) (E05001)<br/>CSS Syntax Error.
## Erreurs de Markdown 

- [**UnknownMarkdownError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-markdown-error/) (E06000)<br/>Unknown Markdown Error.
- [**MarkdownFrontmatterParseError**](/fr/reference/errors/markdown-frontmatter-parse-error/) (E06001)<br/>Failed to parse Markdown frontmatter.
- [**InvalidFrontmatterInjectionError**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-frontmatter-injection-error/) (E06003)<br/>Invalid frontmatter injection.
- [**MdxIntegrationMissingError**](/fr/reference/errors/mdx-integration-missing-error/) (E06004)<br/>MDX integration missing.
- [**UnknownConfigError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-config-error/) (E07000)<br/>Unknown configuration error.
- [**ConfigNotFound**](/fr/reference/errors/config-not-found/) (E07001)<br/>Specified configuration file not found.
- [**ConfigLegacyKey**](/fr/reference/errors/config-legacy-key/) (E07002)<br/>Legacy configuration detected.
## Erreurs du CLI

- [**UnknownCLIError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-clierror/) (E08000)<br/>Unknown CLI Error.
- [**GenerateContentTypesError**](/fr/reference/errors/generate-content-types-error/) (E08001)<br/>Failed to generate content types.
## Erreurs de Collection de Contenu 

- [**UnknownContentCollectionError**](/fr/reference/errors/unknown-content-collection-error/) (E09000)<br/>Unknown Content Collection Error.
- [**InvalidContentEntryFrontmatterError**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-content-entry-frontmatter-error/) (E09001)<br/>Content entry frontmatter does not match schema.
- [**InvalidContentEntrySlugError**](/fr/reference/errors/invalid-content-entry-slug-error/) (E09002)<br/>Invalid content entry slug.
- [**ContentSchemaContainsSlugError**](/fr/reference/errors/content-schema-contains-slug-error/) (E09003)<br/>Content Schema should not contain `slug`.
